verses.roman:
ei mata gītāteha punaḥ punaḥ kaya
sarvadā īśvara-tattva acintya-śakti haya

synonyms: ei mata—in this way; gītāteha—in the Bhagavad-gītā; punaḥ punaḥ—again and again; kaya—it is said; sarvadā—always; īśvara-tattva—the truth of the Absolute Truth; acintya-śakti haya—is inconceivable.
translation: Thus the Bhagavad-gītā also states again and again that the Absolute Truth always possesses inconceivable power.
